file_content.text: You do love to cut it close, don't you?
Vaylin has broken her bonds. Now she will be stronger than ever.
She'll still die when I run my lightsaber through her.
I'm not scared of her.
I hope you get that chance.
Did you discover anything... significant inside my vault?
Are you scared? You should be.
You sound worried.
Your mind games are nothing to me, Outlander. But do not lose focus on what matters. Vaylin must be stopped.
That's only step one. Step two is getting you out of my head.
Be careful what you wish for--lest you get it.
What is our next move, Commander? Vaylin has become more dangerous than ever.
That's why we need to strike now. As soon as we reach Odessen, we launch a counterattack.
We take the fight to her.
I was hoping for a bit of R-and-R after this mission. But you're the one calling the shots.
That blast blew out our hyperdrive. Going to take a while to fix. Everyone get comfortable.
Setting a course for... huh. Call coming in.
Who's the new guy?
My name is Jarak. I am a behavioral scientist.
Actually, you're a prisoner.
Stopping time again? You're back to your old tricks.
You seem better.
My power has returned now that Nathema has been left behind.
Something in particular you're worried about?
That's an odd question.
The artifacts hidden there are more dangerous than you can imagine. If you used them, it would be at your own peril.
She may be stronger, but she's not invincible. We'll find a way to stop her.
We just have to be careful.
Wouldn't mind a bit of R-and-R first. Or at least a nice long nap in my own bed.
Get in!
He's going to be helping Doctor Oggurobb with his... research.
The Alliance won't rest until she's removed from the throne.
We'll stop her.
Nothing important.
[Lie] No.
Good. The relics sealed inside are far too dangerous to be released upon the galaxy.
We can figure out a strategy once we're back on Odessen.
Let's get home first.
Commander--do you copy? Odessen is under attack!
I can still blast her into oblivion.
She doesn't scare me.
Vaylin's long gone. What happened down there?
The Empress broke free from her conditioning. Now she's more dangerous than ever.
Then we must act quickly. What is our next move, Commander?
